channel.title: Sakuli Docs on Sakuli E2E and Monitoring
channel.description: Recent content in Sakuli Docs on Sakuli E2E and Monitoring

item.title: Getting started
item.description: Prerequisites Sakuli is built and tested against the current LTS version of Node.js. So in order to run Sakuli on your system, we will assume that you have a node v10.15.3 (lts/dubnium) installed on your system. To install Node.js on your system, you can either go the node website, or you could use node version manager, a utility to manage various node versions. Initialisation This guide will get you started with writing Sakuli tests from scratch.
